FUNCTION ReplaceAlarmPlaceholderString : STRING
This function can be used to replace placeholders in a message (i.e.
latch variables as âLATCHVAR1â or âLATCHVAR2â) by some strings. This function
can be used to get the resulting alarm message for display when getting a module call
after an alarm was issued.
